document.description: The place was plastered with photos of dogs on the front counter, on the walls, even ... Steak burrito - I have loved Chipotle ever since I first tried their food ...

July 5, 2012 Portillo's Hot Dogs (Chicago) By BiteMe dre in Chicago: We saw this place across from the 2-story McDonald's. We knew it sold hot dogs, but what we didn't know that it was a large food court! We thought it was a restaurant from... Full review June 4, 2012 Portillo's Hot Dogs (Chicago) By dee Cuisine "Where can we get a good Chicago dog?"is what we often asked Chicagoans during our recent trip to Chicago. The response by most: Portillo's Hot Dogs . And if someone asked us the same... Full review May 31, 2012 Portillo's Hot Dogs (Chicago) By Would I Buy It Again? If you look through our blog archives , you can see that we’ve made several visits to Portillo’s throughout the years (have even gotten food by mail) and in each review, we’ve reviewed... Full review
Diner reviews
Fast Food
July 7, 2012 Nicky's Gyros by elipt5 ( 1 review ) Awful dining experience. I was visiting from out of town and had a taste for a good gyro. Instead I got a very average tasting dish, high prices, poor customer service and almost overcharged (even more so than their regular prices). For starters, they tried to charge me for a bottle of water that I brought in. When I explained that I did not take it from the freezer but brought it in myself, I was looked at as if they didn’t believe me and thought I was lying. Next, in my opinion, the prices are really high and the portions are small. I ordered cheese fries and got a few drops of cheese on them. The customer service was bad and I think one of the people working was probably the owner. Lastly, the place was extremely hot – they made it very uncomfortable to stay there and enjoy a meal. Oh and I almost forgot, they require that you spend a minimum of $10 in order to use your credit card. July 5, 2012 Wow Bao Mobile review by Mademoiselle ( 1 review ) The order was not processed correctly and then we had to wait 20 minutes to get an extra quinoa bowl.. The other things got cold in the meantime. July 4, 2012 The Chunky Chicken Mobile review by AnnaR ( 5 reviews ) Went under :(
